data.title: IRST time zone â€” Iran Standard Time
data.meta_description: What time is it IRST? Check exact current time and discover the key facts about Iran Standard Time
data.text:
IRST (Iran Standard Time) is one of the well-known names of UTC+3:30 time zone which is 3:30h. ahead of UTC (Coordinated Universal Time).The time offset from UTC can be written as +03:30.

It's used during the winter. During the summer IRDT - Iran Daylight Time (UTC+4:30) is in use.
